passwordSection.expectedBehavior: Should fit within card boundaries, no overflow

walletActions.expectedBehavior: Buttons should stack vertically on mobile, side-by-side on desktop

statsGrid.expectedBehavior: Should reflow from 4 columns to 2 on mobile
